FuncDef: The display qppb local-policy configuration interface command displays the configuration of QPPB local policies on a specified interface.
CLIs: display qppb local-policy configuration interface { <interface-type> <interface-num> | <interface-name> } { inbound | outbound }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the QPPB configuration information in the inbound direction of an interface.
-

Specifies the QPPB configuration information in the outbound direction of an interface.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display qppb local-policy configuration interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/0 inbound
The qppb local-policy configuration of interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/0:
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can run this command to view the configuration of QPPB local policies on a specified interface.
Prerequisites
The QPPB local policy has been configured successfully.
